line_1: But stretch'd supine upon the social hearth
line_2: Whilst slaunting sun-beams dry the moisten'd earth.

line_1: The cricket chirrups in the hearth;
The cricket chirrups in the hearth;
Warm'd by the blaze of my own cheerful hearth,
line_2: I'll waste the wintry hours in social mirth;

line_1: But that, beside its social hearth
line_2: Dwells every joy, which youthful mirth

line_1: A social blaze to chear their evening hearth.
line_2: How loudly laughs the jovial voice of mirth;
